summary:
Graduated in Business Administration. Years of experience in customer service, troubleshooting and technical support. Due to this experience and having worked in multinational companies, I learned a lot in the Procurement sector, always maintaining a good relationship with suppliers, working to reduce costs and deadlines.

I am a professional with good communication skills in English, focused on results and organized. I am self motivated and work well alone and in a team.

Kind Regards.
amandakellerribeiro@gmail.com

school.name: UNIFACCAMP Centro Universitário Campo Limpo Paulista

profile_positions.location: Campo Limpo Paulista, São Paulo, Brasil
profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for the control, follow-up and execution of activities related to the negotiation and purchase of indirect materials and services in accordance with pre-established standards and norms by the company.
• Identifying suppliers in the market that are compatible with the requirements of specifications, quality, competitiveness, delivery time, among others.
• Perform quotation, analysis, negotiation and selection of suppliers, checking the best commercial conditions and quality level of the products, always aiming to analyze the cost-benefit ratio for carrying out the commercial transaction, without causing loss of quality.
• Create purchase orders and executing related procedures, receiving and analyzing purchase requests, paying attention to the type of product or service, required quantity, required quantity and degree of need, in order to prioritize satisfactory service and deadlines pre-established.
• Contact current and potential suppliers in order to establish future business and maintain a good relationship.
• Create contracts with suppliers, under supervision, such as: equipment leasing, forwarded for analysis by the legal area and later approval by the area's management and the company's board of directors.
• Follow the order delivery schedule, checking the delivery time.
• Creation of purchase contracts with suppliers to increase the level of automation.
profile_positions.title: Junior Buyer

profile_positions.location: Campo Limpo Paulista, São Paulo, Brasil
profile_positions.description:
• Support in purchasing activities.
• Carry out studies and issue conclusive reports.
• Contact and negotiate with several suppliers.
• Responsible for the control, follow-up and execution of activities related to the negotiation and purchase of indirect materials and services in accordance with pre-established standards and norms by the company.
• Identifying suppliers in the market that are compatible with the requirements of specifications, quality, competitiveness, delivery time, among others.
• Carry out quotation, analysis, negotiation and selection of suppliers, checking the best commercial conditions and quality level of the products, always aiming to analyze the cost-benefit ratio for carrying out the commercial transaction, without loss of quality.
• Follow-up of orders and requisitions.
• Support for purchasing management activities.
• Carry out an economic feasibility study.
• Contact and negotiate area issues with contract managers.
profile_positions.title: Purchasing Trainee

profile_positions.description:
• Carry out the monitoring and collection of defaulting customers.
• Generate report through system.
• Carry out active and receptive telephone service to customers.
• Clarifying doubts and negotiating debts.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service

profile_positions.description:
• Execution of various administrative activities, entering data in the company's system, in spreadsheets, control systems and/or noting data in protocols, ensuring that the quality of the work carried out always remains within the defined and determined standards, and in accordance with with the procedures and methods pre-established by the company's regulations.
• Document scanning.
• Physical and electronic filing of documents.
• Provide assistance to the area, controlling documents and appointment schedules in an organized way, as well as helping to provide information to the Immediate Superior, in order to enable him to identify measures to be taken and prioritize the accomplishment of tasks.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant
